interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Blob (1988) / Christine (1983) / Fright Night (1985) / Seventh Sign
Review Date: 2014/03/21
Store: Kevin Dillon  (Actor),     Keith Gordon  (Actor)    Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles
Product Description: ['The Blob - a malignant, gelatinous life-form takes over a small town in this visually gut-wrenching thriller. Christine - the twisted love story of a teenager and his obsessively jealous 1958 Plymouth Fury. Fright Night - a teenager enlists the help of a TV horror movie host to subdue a suave vampire. The Seventh Sign - Demi Moore electrifies as a young woman who must prevent her unborn baby from playing an ominous role in the coming of the end of the world.']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Horror', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Chris Sarandon, Amanda Bearse, Demi Moore, Keith Gordon, 4-Movie Horror Unleashed Collection, Kevin DillonChris Sarandon, Amanda Bearse, Demi Moore, Keith Gordon, 4-Movie Horror Unleashed Collection, Kevin Dillon  See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '6 hours and 47 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1, 1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '6 hours and 47 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 11, 2013', 'Actors': 'Kevin Dillon, Keith Gordon, Chris Sarandon, Amanda Bearse, Demi Moore', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish', 'Studio': 'Sony Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: Every movie in this set is great! Originally wanted just the classic Fright Night, but who's to say no to a few dollars more to get three other great movies.
Review Title: Four fantastic movies
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

This user demonstrates a strong preference for classic horror films, specifically from the 1980s. They appreciate quality storytelling and engaging plots, as indicated by their high rating of 5.0 for a collection featuring multiple films. Their enthusiasm for films like "Fright Night," "The Blob," "Christine," and "The Seventh Sign" highlights a fondness for supernatural and thriller themes, particularly those that combine horror with a touch of nostalgia and unique character-driven narratives.

The user values collections that offer multiple features, suggesting a tendency to seek out value in their purchases. Their interaction shows a willingness to explore beyond initial interests when presented with quality options, showing an adventurous spirit in film selection. As they also mention a specific actor associated with one of the films, it’s likely they have an appreciation for notable performances and iconic figures in the genre. 

Overall, the user enjoys engaging horror narratives from past decades, favors collections that encompass a variety of films, and is inclined towards impactful characters and stories within the horror genre.
